mil7.4.6:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘ākāsassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.6:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbaso kilesehi agayhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti saṅkhāresu mānasaṃ sañcārayitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbabhavapaṭisandhīsu mānasaṃ ubbejayitabbaṃ, assādo na kātabbo.
mil7.4.6:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, ākāso ananto appamāṇo aparimeyyo;
mil7.4.6:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anantasīlena aparimitañāṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:4.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, ākāso alaggo asatto appatiṭṭhito apalibuddho;
mil7.4.6:5.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe āvāse palibodhe paccaye sabbakilesesu ca sabbattha alaggena bhavitabbaṃ, anāsattena appatiṭṭhitena apalibuddhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:5.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, ākāsassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.6:5.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena sakaṃ puttaṃ rāhulaṃ ovadantena—
mil7.4.6:6.2: evameva kho tvaṃ, rāhula, ākāsasamaṃ bhāvanaṃ bhāvehi.
mil7.4.6:6.3: Ākāsasamaṃ hi te, rāhula, bhāvanaṃ bhāvayato uppannā manāpāmanāpā phassā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassantī’”ti.
